subject: Football
Sports Injuries
Football
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Cruz, who injured his left calf in mid-August, missed the season-opening game with Dallas, and the Giants must now be weighing the option of holding Cruz out of the first three games of the season.
snippet: Cruz, who injured his left calf in mid-August, missed the season-opening game with Dallas, and the Giants must now be weighing the option of holding Cruz out of the first three games of the season.
